subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Ahhh the infamous Fish!
author: black bear hollow
full_text:
It's all heresay. I never experienced a spiritual hierarchy on the  
other side when I was there. Over there, where I was, there was no  
such thing as ego - only love.

Not everything dear Edgar stated was fact or true. Many predictions he  
made never came to fruition. So again, I wouldn't take that as proof,  
but just someone's opinion.

w.

On Aug 18, 2008, at 4:35 PM, threadsintyme@... wrote:

> What I mean by the term lower entity is that the existence on the  
> other side is made up of different levels. How do we know that this  
> is true? Trance mediums and plain ole mediums have shown that it is  
> so. Plus, Edgar Cayce has spoken of the time when he went into the  
> lower realms and it bothered him for years.
>
> Al
